amendment.description: Amendment sought to prevent the use of Community Development Block grant funds for local matching requirements.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 110-53 to strike section 103 of the bill. Section 103 eliminates the prohibition of use for match requirement.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Price (GA) amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 98 - 333 (Roll no. 169).
